ISSUE.TITLE: Deploy SSH: enable "scp -r"
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hi there, I ran into some trouble on my own drone service, I wanted to specify a directory as artifact but because there is no check on the artifact type [here](https://github.com/drone/drone/blob/f3530d76b2f599e2937ce481ddd7498a65588046/pkg/plugin/deploy/ssh.go#L76), `scp` is not called using `-r` so it cannot send a folder to remote host. Is it possible to add this feature ? (I might be able to do a feature request if you want)
